Armour Pack: Lucky 13, Death From Above and Hot Rod
Ensemble Armure : Lucky 13, Death From Above et Hot Rod
Rüstungsbündel: Lucky 13, Death From Above und Hot Rod
Pacchetto di armature: Lucky 13, Death From Above e Hot Rod
Pack de armadura: Lucky 13, Death From Above y Hot Rod
아머 팩: 럭키 13, 죽음의 그림자, 핫 로드 (남성)
Armor Pack: Lucky 13, Death From Above and Hot Rod (Men)
裝甲服裝組：幸運13 、死從天降及灼熱之棒(男用)
裝甲服裝組：幸運13 、死從天降及灼熱之棒(男用)
Armor Pack: Lucky 13, Death From Above and Hot Rod
kDesc

Contains the following three full Armour sets for you to mix and match, Lucky 13 Light Armour Set, Death From Above Medium Armour Set and Hot Rod Heavy Armour Set, contains the following fifteen parts: 
 
 1. Lucky 13 - Light Field Body Armour 
 2. Lucky 13 - Light Field Boots 
 3. Lucky 13 - Light Field Glove 
 4. Lucky 13 - Light Field Helmet 
 5. Lucky 13 - Light Field Leg Armour 
 6. Death From Above - Medium Assault Body Armour 
 7. Death From Above - Medium Assault Boots 
 8. Death From Above - Medium Assault Gloves 
 9. Death From Above - Medium Assault Helmet 
 10. Death From Above - Medium Assault Leg Armour 
 11. Hot Rod - Heavy Combat Body Armour 
 12. Hot Rod - Heavy Combat Boots 
 13. Hot Rod - Heavy Combat Gloves 
 14. Hot Rod - Heavy Combat Helmet 
 15. Hot Rod - Heavy Combat Leg Armour [#Legal]

Vous n'aurez que l'embarras du choix avec ces trois ensembles Armure complets (Ensemble Armure Légère Lucky 13, Ensemble Armure Moyenne Death From Above & Ensemble Armure Lourde Hot Rod), contenant les quinze éléments suivants : 
 
 1. Lucky 13 - Gilet de terrain léger 
 2. Lucky 13 - Bottes de terrain légères 
 3. Lucky 13 - Gant de terrain légers 
 4. Lucky 13 - Casque de terrain léger 
 5. Lucky 13 - Jambières de terrain légères 
 6. Death From Above - Gilet d'assaut moyen 
 7. Death From Above - Bottes d'assaut moyennes 
 8. Death From Above - Gants d'assaut moyens 
 9. Death From Above - Casque d'assaut moyen 
 10. Death From Above - Jambières d'assaut moyennes 
 11. Hot Rod - Gilet de combat lourd 
 12. Hot Rod - Bottes de combat lourdes 
 13. Hot Rod - Gants de combat lourds 
 14. Hot Rod - Casque de combat lourd 
 15. Hot Rod - Jambières de combat lourdes [#Legal]

Enthält die folgenden drei kompletten Rüstungssets für Dich zum Kombinieren: Leichtes Rüstungsset Lucky 13, Mittelschweres Rüstungsset Death From Above & Schweres Rüstungsset Hot Rod; umfasst die folgenden fünfzehn Teile: 
 
 1. Lucky 13 - Leichte Panzerweste 
 2. Lucky 13 - Leichte Stiefel 
 3. Lucky 13 - Leichte Handschuhe 
 4. Lucky 13 - Leichter Helm 
 5. Lucky 13 - Leichte Beinrüstung 
 6. Death From Above - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 7. Death From Above - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 8. Death From Above - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 9. Death From Above - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 10. Death From Above - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 11. Hot Rod - Panzerweste für schwere Kämpfe 
 12. Hot Rod - Stiefel für schwere Kämpfe 
 13. Hot Rod - Handschuhe für schwere Kämpfe 
 14. Hot Rod - Helm für schwere Kämpfe 
 15. Hot Rod - Beinrüstung für schwere Kämpfe [#Legal]

Contiene i tre set di armature seguenti che possono essere mischiati tra loro: set di armatura leggera Lucky 13, set di armatura media Death from Above e set di armatura pesante Hot Rod. Contiene i 15 componenti seguenti: 
 
 1. Lucky 13 - armatura per il corpo da combattimento leggero 
 2. Lucky 13 - stivali da combattimento leggero 
 3. Lucky 13 - guanti da combattimento leggero 
 4. Lucky 13 - casco da combattimento leggero 
 5. Lucky 13 - armatura per le gambe da combattimento leggero 
 6. Death From Above - armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio 
 7. Death From Above - stivali d'assalto medio 
 8. Death From Above - guanti d'assalto medio 
 9. Death From Above - casco d'assalto medio 
 10. Death From Above - armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio 
 11. Hot Rod - armatura per il corpo da combattimento pesante 
 12. Hot Rod - stivali da combattimento pesante 
 13. Hot Rod - guanti da combattimento pesante 
 14. Hot Rod - casco da combattimento pesante 
 15. Hot Rod - armatura per le gambe da combattimento pesante [#Legal]

Contiene los tres siguientes sets de armadura, que podrás combinar entre ellos: Lucky 13 ligera, Death From Above media y Hot Rod pesada. Se compone de las 15 partes siguientes: 
 
 1. Lucky 13 - Armadura corporal de campo ligera 
 2. Lucky 13 - Botas de campo ligeras 
 3. Lucky 13 - Guantes de campo ligeros 
 4. Lucky 13 - Casco de campo ligero 
 5. Lucky 13 - Armadura de campo ligera para pierna 
 6. Death From Above - Armadura corporal de asalto media 
 7. Death From Above - Botas de asalto medias 
 8. Death From Above - Guantes de asalto medios 
 9. Death From Above - Casco de asalto medio 
 10. Death From Above - Armadura de asalto media para pierna 
 11. Hot Rod - Armadura corporal de combate pesada 
 12. Hot Rod - Botas de combate pesadas 
 13. Hot Rod - Guantes de combate pesados 
 14. Hot Rod - Casco de combate pesado 
 15. Hot Rod - Armadura de combate pesada para pierna [#Legal]

다음과 같은 세 개의 방어구 세트의 15개 아이템을 포함합니다. 자유로운 연출이 가능합니다 - 럭키 13 경량 방어구 세트, 죽음의 그림자 중형 방어구 세트, 핫 로드 강화 방어구 세트:
 
 1. 럭키 13 - 경량 야전 상체방어구 (남성)
 2. 럭키 13 - 경량 야전부츠 (남성)
 3. 럭키 13 - 경량 야전장갑 (남성)
 4. 럭키 13 - 경량 야전헬멧 (남성)
 5. 럭키 13 - 경량 야전 하체방어구 (남성)
 6. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (남성)
 7. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 돌격부츠 (남성)
 8. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 돌격장갑 (남성)
 9. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (남성)
 10. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (남성)
 11. 핫 로드 - 강화 전투 상체방어구 (남성)
 12. 핫 로드 - 강화 전투부츠 (남성)
 13. 핫 로드 - 강화 전투장갑 (남성)
 14. 핫 로드 - 강화 전투헬멧 (남성)
 15. 핫 로드 - 강화 전투 하체방어구 (남성) [#Legal]

Contains the following three full armor sets for you to mix and match, Lucky 13 Light Armor Set, Death From Above Medium Armor Set and Hot Rod Heavy Armor Set, contains the following fifteen parts:
 
 1. Lucky 13 - Light Field Body Armor (Men)
 2. Lucky 13 - Light Field Boots (Men)
 3. Lucky 13 - Light Field Glove (Men)
 4. Lucky 13 - Light Field Helmet (Men)
 5. Lucky 13 - Light Field Leg Armor (Men)

 9. Death From Above - Medium Assault Helmet (Men)
 10. Death From Above - Medium Assault Leg Armor (Men)
 11. Hot Rod - Heavy Combat Body Armor (Men)
 12. Hot Rod - Heavy Combat Boots (Men)
 13. Hot Rod - Heavy Combat Gloves (Men)
 14. Hot Rod - Heavy Combat Helmet (Men)
 15. Hot Rod - Heavy Combat Leg Armor (Men) [#Legal]

包括幸運13輕型裝甲服裝組、死從天降中型裝甲服裝組及灼熱之棒重型裝甲服裝組3套裝甲服裝組，可用作自由配搭。當中包括下列15個部分： 
 
 1. 幸運13 - 輕型野外護甲(男用)

 13. 灼熱之棒 - 重型戰鬥手套(男用) 
 14. 灼熱之棒 - 重型戰鬥頭盔(男用) 
 15. 灼熱之棒 - 重型戰鬥護脛(男用) [#Legal]
